EmailTemplate.description: Notify licensee their Permit was successfully Issued
EmailTemplate.name: Permit Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Permit Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
.This message is auto-generated by the eSLA
*Please do not reply to this email*
{!Today()}
Dear {!MUSW__Permit2__c.MUSW__Account__c},
Permit number {!MUSW__Permit2__c.Name} has been successfully issued and valid through {!MUSW__Permit2__c.MUSW__Expiration_Date__c}.
If you have any questions then please contact the DIS office during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wi.gov.
Sincerely,
eSLA Team
